title: Can I do a regular masters and an open IGNOU masters at the same time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes, you can. Graduation is the min eligibility criteria for getting admission for PG course. But don't get confused in both the course and be careful that both the exams don't clash on the same date. All the best!!
Yes you can do. But stay careful about preparation and exam dates. In addition you have to keep in mind that you cant produce both degrees for same job at the same time. All the best.
